channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: National Rent Control, Falling Mortgage Rates, and Fleeing Homebuyers
item.description: A new nationwide rent control proposal could cap rent increases for any landlord with a certain amount of properties. But will it actually pass? How would landlords survive when rents […]

item.title: Revolut receives long-awaited UK banking license
item.description: This is a significant milestone for the London-based fintech company, particularly since it has been trying to secure this license since 2021. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Photos: Three Years of a Family’s Grief and Healing After a Fatal Police Shooting
item.description: Photographer Michael Indriolo documents an East Cleveland family’s search for peace after the 2021 police shooting of their 19-year-old brother.

item.title: 12 Cities You’ll Regret You Didn’t Invest In 10 Years From Now
item.description: Now that the pandemic boom is over, it's time to scope out the next set of markets gearing up for a boom.

item.title: Oversight Board wants Meta to refine its policies around AI-generated explicit images
item.description: The Board wants Meta to change the terminology it uses for labeling explicit, AI-generated images from "derogatory" to "non-consensual." © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Resources to Power Your Criminal Justice Reporting
item.description: We’ve compiled guidance on key issues for anyone covering the legal system — styles and standards to FOIA requests

item.title: Investors Made a Record Share of Home Purchases in Q1
item.description: Investor buyers accounted for 14.8% of home sales in the first quarter of 2024—the highest share on record.

item.title: Google Maps adds a slew of features to entice Indian drivers, commuters and travelers
item.description: Google Maps is improving navigation through flyovers and narrow roads in India through new feature updates. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Marshall Project Launches Investigate This!
item.description: Our toolkits will offer data, storytelling and engagement resources to empower more criminal justice reporting in local communities

item.title: Foreign Investment Curbed by Proposed Housing Rule, But It Comes With Potential Consequences for American Investors
item.description: The Treasury Department's proposed rule would make it harder for foreign investors to purchase land near military installations, adding to a 2018 law. The cascading effects could also impact Americans.

item.title: bunch raises $15.5M for its platform that simplifies investment management for VCs
item.description: Public market investors have a large variety of infrastructure and software that helps them keep track of, analyze and manage their investments, but that’s not the case for investors in private companies, such as venture capitalists. Indeed, a lot of private market investors have to manage and upload information about their investments into a plethora […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How to Investigate the Trend of Declining Prison Staff and Deteriorating Conditions Behind Bars
item.description: Our toolkit helps you report on how this employment crisis impacts safety and local budgets in your state.

item.title: Why Long-term Rental Properties Aren’t as Great as They’re Hyped Up to Be
item.description: Long-term rentals may disappoint if you don't consider three key factors: long-term rent growth, appreciation, and the tenant segment the property attracts.

item.title: Jio partners with Taiwan’s MediaTek to tap into two-wheeler EV market
item.description: India's Jio has partnered with Taiwanese semiconductor giant MediaTek to launch its 4G smart dashboards for electric two-wheelers. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How to Investigate COVID’s Deadly Toll in Your State Prisons
item.description: Our toolkit helps you report on deadly systemic failures and analyze the pandemic as a case study of how facilities can prepare for the next crisis.
